terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.importantNotice: Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully before making a reservation. By booking with Mustaqar RS, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By making a reservation with Mustaqar RS, you confirm that you are at least 18 years of age and have the legal authority to enter into this agreement. These Terms and Conditions constitute a legally binding agreement between you (the Guest) and Mustaqar RS (the Property). Your booking confirmation serves as acceptance of these terms in their entirety.

booking.title: 2. Booking & Payment
booking.content: All bookings are subject to availability and confirmation. Payment is required to secure your reservation. We accept various payment methods including bank transfers, credit cards, and approved digital payment platforms.
requirements: Full payment is required at the time of booking for stays under 30 days
For monthly rentals, first month's rent plus security deposit is due upon booking
A refundable security deposit equal to one month's rent is required
Valid identification (passport, Saudi ID, or Iqama) must be provided
All prices are in Saudi Riyal (SAR) and include applicable VAT
Yearly bookings receive up to 15% discount on total rental amount

cancellation.title: 3. Cancellation Policy
cancellation.content: We understand that plans may change. Our cancellation policy is designed to be fair to all parties while protecting our business operations:
policies: Cancellations 30+ days before check-in: Full refund minus 500 SAR administrative fee
Cancellations 15-29 days before check-in: 50% refund of total booking amount
Cancellations 7-14 days before check-in: 25% refund of total booking amount
Cancellations less than 7 days before check-in: No refund
No-shows will be charged the full booking amount
Early departure does not qualify for a refund
Refunds are processed within 7-10 business days to original payment method

checkInOut.title: 4. Check-In & Check-Out
checkInOut.content: Smooth transitions help us maintain our high standards of service. Please adhere to the following check-in and check-out procedures:
details: Early check-in available upon request (subject to availability, additional fee may apply)
Late check-out available upon request (subject to availability, additional fee may apply)
Key collection and property walkthrough required at check-in
Property inspection will be conducted at check-out
All keys and access cards must be returned at check-out
Late check-out without prior approval may incur additional charges

guestResponsibilities.title: 5. Guest Responsibilities
guestResponsibilities.content: As a guest, you are responsible for maintaining the property and respecting our community guidelines. Failure to comply may result in immediate termination of your stay without refund:
rules: Maintain the property in clean and orderly condition
Quiet hours must be observed from 10:00 PM to 8:00 AM
No smoking inside the property (designated outdoor areas only)
No illegal substances or activities on the premises
No pets allowed without prior written approval (pet deposit required)
Guests must be registered; unauthorized occupants are not permitted
Report any maintenance issues or damages immediately
Do not disturb other residents or neighbors
No subletting, short-term rentals, or commercial use of the property
Maximum occupancy limits must be respected
Dispose of garbage properly using designated areas
No modifications or alterations to the property without written consent

included.title: 6. What's Included
included.content: Your rental includes a comprehensive package of amenities and services designed for comfortable living:
items: Fully furnished studio apartment with premium furnishings
Water and electricity utilities (fair usage policy applies)
Access to fitness center and swimming pool
Full kitchen with appliances and cookware

liability.title: 7. Liability & Insurance
liability.content: While we strive to ensure your safety and comfort, certain limitations of liability apply. We strongly recommend guests obtain travel or rental insurance:
points: Mustaqar RS is not liable for loss, theft, or damage to personal belongings
Guests are responsible for damages caused by themselves or their visitors
Security deposit will be used to cover any damages beyond normal wear and tear
We are not responsible for interruptions to utilities or services beyond our control
Personal injury claims are limited to cases of proven negligence on our part
Guests should secure valuables in the provided safe
We recommend guests maintain their own travel/rental insurance
Maximum liability is limited to the amount of rent paid for the affected period

privacy.title: 8. Privacy & Data Protection
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. We collect and process personal information solely for booking management, property access, communication about your stay, and legal compliance. Your data is stored securely and never sold to third parties. For detailed information about our data practices, please refer to our Privacy Policy. You have the right to access, correct, or request deletion of your personal data by contacting our privacy team.

rightToRefuse.title: 9. Right to Refuse Service
rightToRefuse.content: Mustaqar RS reserves the right to refuse or terminate service to any guest who violates these Terms and Conditions, engages in illegal activities, damages property, disturbs other guests or neighbors, provides false information during booking, or presents a safety risk. In such cases, no refund will be provided, and legal action may be pursued if necessary.

modifications.title: 10. Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Material changes will be communicated to current guests via email at least 30 days before taking effect. Continued use of our services after modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated terms. The most current version will always be available on our website.

governingLaw.title: 11. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Any disputes arising from these terms or your stay shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. We encourage guests to first attempt to resolve any disputes through our customer service team before pursuing legal remedies.

rentalContractTerms.title: 12. Rental Contract Terms
rentalContractTerms.content: In addition to the above Terms and Conditions, the following rental contract terms apply to all confirmed bookings:
terms: 1. This rental agreement is subject to the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and shall be enforced in accordance with Saudi laws and regulations.
2. The rental period shall be paid monthly (or as otherwise agreed). The rental amount is non-refundable once the rental period has commenced.
3. The guest must submit a valid identification document (Saudi ID, Iqama, or Passport) for verification purposes upon check-in.
4. Maintenance and repairs of structural elements and building systems are the responsibility of the property owner. The guest is responsible for maintenance of items provided for guest use.
5. Early cancellation of the rental agreement is subject to a penalty charge as specified in the Cancellation Policy. No refunds will be issued for the cancellation fees.
6. The guest shall be responsible for payment of electricity and water bills according to fair usage, or as specified in the booking agreement. The amount will be billed separately.

7. The guest is liable for any damage to the property caused by their actions or negligence. Damage repairs shall be deducted from the security deposit, or an invoice shall be issued for repair costs.
8. Key handover shall occur during the check-in process between the property management and the guest. The guest is responsible for the safekeeping of all keys and access cards.
9. A security deposit equal to one month's rent is required and shall be refunded within 14 days after check-out, provided the property is in acceptable condition.
10. Subletting of the property, short-term rental of the property to third parties, or any commercial use of the property is strictly prohibited.
11. The guest agrees to maintain peaceful enjoyment of the property and shall not engage in any illegal activities or create disturbances that affect other residents.
12. The property owner reserves the right to enter the property for maintenance, repairs, or inspections with 24 hours advance notice, except in cases of emergency.
13. This rental agreement may be amended or terminated by either party with written notice as specified in the applicable laws. Any amendments must be made in writing and signed by both parties.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our studio rental services and website.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly, such as:
items: Personal information: name, email, phone number
Identification documents: passport, Saudi ID, or Iqama
Financial information: payment and billing details
Booking information: dates, preferences, and special requests
Emergency contacts and medical information (if provided)

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: We use your information for the following purposes:
purposes: Communicating about your reservation and stay
Responding to inquiries and customer support

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to enhance user experience. Cookies are small files stored on your device that help us:
details: You can disable cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect website functionality

thirdParties.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParties.content: We may share your information with trusted third parties for specific purposes:
services: Payment processors and banks for transaction handling
Booking systems and property management software
Legal and compliance advisors when required

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, and misuse. However, no method of transmission is 100% secure. We encourage you to use strong passwords and keep your login credentials confidential.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy. Booking records are kept for a minimum of 7 years for legal and tax compliance. You can request deletion of your data subject to legal requirements.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
rights: Right to access your personal data
Right to delete your data (right to be forgotten)
Right to opt-out of marketing communications
To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@soom.sa

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for children under 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we discover that a child has provided us with personal information, we will delete such information immediately.

externalLinks.title: External Links
externalLinks.content: Our website may contain links to external websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of third-party websites. Please review their privacy policies before providing any personal information.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes via email or by posting an updated policy on our website. Your continued use of our services indicates acceptance of the revised policy.
